[DQC.IFRS.0008.6819] The calculation in the extension taxonomy rolling up from Equity to EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent in 05 - Statement of financial position is the opposite of a calculation defined in the base taxonomy. Check that the calculation is correct or that you have used the correct tag for the two elements identified in the calculation It is possible that the calculation is correct in the case of a reconciliation calculation. Check that the concept EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent is the correct calculation parent for this element.
Rule version: 17.0.0 -

[DQC.IFRS.0080.8757] ifrs-full:AdjustmentsForDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense has a value of -20,100,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.

entry.message:
[DQC.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of -9,500,000 reported in the network role http://addikobankag.com/xbrl/2020/roles/StatementOfComprehensiveIncome should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 9,500,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://addikobankag.com/xbrl/2020/roles/StatementOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -5 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -6 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900UKZBMDBDZIXD62/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/addikobankag_eng.zip/addikobankag/reports/addikobankag.xhtml 9573
